mapper.sql: a.owid AS "owid", a.dtrid AS "dtrid", a.dtrxm AS "dtrxm", a.ksdt AS "ksdt", a.jsdt AS "jsdt", a.dtsc AS "dtsc", a.zdf AS "zdf", a.exp1 AS "exp1", a.exp2 AS "exp2", a.exp3 AS "exp3", a.exp4 AS "exp4", a.exp5 AS "exp5", a.exp6 AS "exp6", a.exp7 AS "exp7", a.exp8 AS "exp8", a.exp9 AS "exp9", a.exp10 AS "exp10", a.createtime AS "createtime", a.creator AS "creator", a.creator_name AS "creatorName", a.lastupdate AS "lastupdate", a.updator AS "updator", a.updator_name AS "updatorName", a.ver AS "ver", a.vertime AS "vertime", a.dept_id AS "deptId", a.dept_path AS "deptPath", a.delflg AS "delflg", a.state AS "state"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bckj_biz_dcwj_jg( owid, dtrid, dtrxm, ksdt, jsdt, dtsc, zdf, exp1, exp2, exp3, exp4, exp5, exp6, exp7, exp8, exp9, exp10, createtime, creator, creator_name, lastupdate, updator, updator_name, ver, vertime, dept_id, dept_path, delflg, state ) VALUES ( #{owid}, #{dtrid}, #{dtrxm}, #{ksdt}, #{jsdt}, #{dtsc}, #{zdf}, #{exp1}, #{exp2}, #{exp3}, #{exp4}, #{exp5}, #{exp6}, #{exp7}, #{exp8}, #{exp9}, #{exp10}, #{createtime}, #{creator}, #{creatorName}, #{lastupdate}, #{updator}, #{updatorName}, #{ver}, #{vertime}, #{deptId}, #{deptPath}, #{delflg}, #{state} )
mapper.update: UPDATE bckj_biz_dcwj_jg SET owid = #{owid}, dtrid = #{dtrid}, dtrxm = #{dtrxm}, ksdt = #{ksdt}, jsdt = #{jsdt}, dtsc = #{dtsc}, zdf = #{zdf}, exp1 = #{exp1}, exp2 = #{exp2}, exp3 = #{exp3}, exp4 = #{exp4}, exp5 = #{exp5}, exp6 = #{exp6}, exp7 = #{exp7}, exp8 = #{exp8}, exp9 = #{exp9}, exp10 = #{exp10}, createtime = #{createtime}, creator = #{creator}, creator_name = #{creatorName}, lastupdate = #{lastupdate}, updator = #{updator}, updator_name = #{updatorName}, ver = #{ver}, vertime = #{vertime}, dept_id = #{deptId}, dept_path = #{deptPath}, delflg = #{delflg}, state = #{state} WHERE owid = #{owid}
